description: It is a piece of meat that has been stopped for a while. It never decays, but it can not be eaten in this condition. You can use it to return to a state suitable for eating by canceling the time stop.

use_action.msg: I canceled the time stop so that I could eat the piece of meat.

description: It is a doll that has been broken in vain. It closed its eyes to sleep and it do not move. If you care carefully, you can use it again.
It is a doll full of roses. It closed its eyes to sleep and it do not move. If you care carefully, you can use it again.

It is a carved stone. A golem is completed by embedding this stone in the material. Create a golem from the construction menu.
A powerful and lonely horse suitable for riding horse-drawn horses.
It is a synthetic beast that has reached the same horsepower as a car engine. He synthesized blobs and overcame sunlight, the vampire's weak point, but he became deformed and was no longer a horse.
